Articles.Content:
Where are the action groups ? 0.90 career

Edited December 16, 2014 by Lohan2008

You have to upgrade your SPH and/or VAB in order to gain access to action groups, a list of the limitations can be found here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103034
Never mind, they is a level one upgrade /face palm.

There are actually two upgrades for action groups.

At the base level of the VAB, you have no action groups.

At your first upgrade, to level 2, you have basic action groups - lights, gear,...

On full upgrade, level 3, you have basic and custom action groups available.
